ISEBE LEENKONZO ZOLUNTU NOLAWULO: UBUME






UBUME



USHICILELO



AMAQUMRHU KAHULUMENTE



UQHAGAMSHELWANO



Injongo yeSebe Leenkonzo Zoluntu Nolawulo kukukhokela ukulungiselela ukuba iinkonzo zoluntu zilungele amaxesha angoku ngokuthi kuncediswe amasebe karhulumente ekusunguleni imigaqo-nkqubo yawo yolawulo, iinkqubo zawo neenkqubo zokufumana izisombululo zobume bawo, oko kusenziwa ngokwesicwangciso semigaqo nemimiselo esebenza ngokubanzi, ukuze kuphuculwe indlela yokunikezela ngeenkonzo.

Eminye imiba eli Sebe elisebenzana nayo yile:
* Imiba yentsholongwane kaGawulyo/noGawulayo
* Ukulwa urhwaphilizo
* Iphulo le-Batho Pele
* Iinkonzo zabaxumi
* Imiqathango ekusetyenzwa phantsi kwayo
* Ulawulo lukarhulumentengobuxhaka-xhaka bonxibelelwano
* Iindlela zokuqesha
* Uphuhliso lwabasebenzi
* Amaphulo obuxhaka-xhaka bonxibelelwano
* Ukuvavanywa kwemisebenzi
* Ubudlelwane kwezabasebenzi neenkqubo zokubonisana
* Unxibelelwano kwezemfundo
* Imivuzo
* Iinkonzo zabaphathi abakhulu
* Inkqubo yeenguqu
* Ukuphuculwa kweenkqubo
